name: bottle-cap
effect: Trade to Mr. Hyper to set one of a Pokémon's genes to 31.
short_effect: Trade to Mr. Hyper to maximize one of a Pokémon's genes.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A beautiful bottle cap that gives off a silver gleam.
Some people are happy to receive one.
